subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2071 is on the way
description_text:
Is there any way to see the current tracking status by any chance. I can’t seem to be able yo track my order and do not have an expected delivery date. Thank you, Marcos. Sent from my iPhone On Jul 21, 2025, at 2:36 AM, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 







 
 Your order is on the way

 Order #SSN2071
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your order is on the way 
 Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View your order 
 
 
 
 
 
 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Other tracking number: JSEGH2167266568YQ
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) 
 

 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 



 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback × 1 

 
 Plus X Pedal Control Box 
 

 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Marcos Mendez,    You can track it through this link, because of the tariffs, we have chosen the duty free channel, which doesn't require you to pay tariffs, but it will also be on the longer side, and is expected to arrive for you in early August.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEGH2167266568YQ
